column6: Magneto battles Exodus on the Astral Plane! Will the Master of Magnetism's power count for anything in a place outside the laws of reality? Plus, Rogue sets out in Australia on a mysterious journey while trouble brews within the Hellfire Club!
column8: | writer:Mike Carey | colorist:Frank D'Armata | artist:Scot Eaton | penciller (cover):David Finch
